Folder.label: VERILOG Component Instantiation
Folder.Template:
// The following must be inserted into your Verilog file for this // core to be instantiated. Change the instance name and port connections // (in parentheses) to your own signal names.
FFT YourInstanceName ( .clk(clk), .ce(ce), .reset(reset), .start(start), .fwd_inv(fwd_inv), .mrd(mrd), .mwr(mwr), .xn_re(xn_re), // Bus [15 : 0] .xn_im(xn_im), // Bus [15 : 0] .ovflo(ovflo), .done(done), .edone(edone), .busy(busy), .xk_re(xk_re), // Bus [15 : 0] .xk_im(xk_im)); // Bus [15 : 0]

Folder.label: VHDL Component Instantiation
